channel.title: Unexpected server response?
channel.description:
supp? well, my client won't connect to my server, it says "unexpected server response" but my server batch file window says connection received from: 127.0.0.1 ... how do i fix? how can i make the client connect to my server??
Fat Cookies edit: Please use more appropriate thread titles.

item.title: Unexpected server response?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

i suggest making the topic name go according to your problem…
‘CLICK HERE FOR A COOKIE’
just makes it sound like a troll.

Read full topic

item.title: Unexpected server response?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Your server is probably programmed to only accept connection’s from a specific client.

Read full topic
